briefTitle: Does Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Affect the Incidence of pH1N1 Influenza?

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of pH1N1 Influenza Infections as Diagnosed by PCR From Mid-turbinate Swab
outcomeMeasures.description: Influenza infection (pH1N1) as diagnosed by PCR from self-collected mid-turbinate swab. Participant is asked to collect a swab when they have symptoms possibly compatible with an acute viral respiratory illness: 1) fever without another obvious source, 2) at least two new respiratory symptoms (runny or stuffy nose, sneezing, sore or scratchy throat, hoarseness, cough), or 3) one respiratory symptom (as above) and one systemic symptom (fever, malaise, muscle aches, headache, fatigue)
